title: Pathfinder
description: Python program that takes arcGis data and finds a path from west to east that involves the least amount of elevation change, then plots a representation of the landscape and all possible paths using the pillow library.

title: Zombie Survival
description: Browser game built using the HTML canvas element and object oriented programming in Javascript.
